name: MapR5DeviceusageStatusForR4DeviceStatementStatus
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet R5-deviceusage-status-for-R4-device-statement-status from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/deviceusage-status|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
